sentences.sContent: Despite these new relationships, the fungible nature of oil will limit the extent to which this economic shift eastward translates into a geopolitical one.
sentences.sContent_eng: Despite these new relationships, the fungible nature of oil will limit the extent to which this economic shift eastward translates into a geopolitical one.
sentences.sCn: 尽管出现了上述种种新型关系，但石油本质上的可替代性，将限制这种经济东移转化为地缘政治转移的程度。
